column6: Only dual screen when playing DVD
column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2021
column14: I purchased this item specifically for the HDMI connection ability and the dual screen. We were headed on a 30 day road trip. We installed it before the trip but did not actually use it until we were traveling. Unfortunately the functions I bought it for did not work and I missed the return window because we were traveling.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2020
column14: We really enjoy them. They are an awesome edition to long trips. And th picture is awesome and clear. A lot better than the traditional car dvd players. The sound is good. I like the mounting brackets looks clean. And i like it. We just leave the mounting brackets in all the time.

column6: Works as advertised though not really impressed
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020
column14: It gets the job done but I would not call it “premium”.  The video and sound quality is not quite what I would like, though I am used to watching videos on an iphone x. I wouldn’t call them LED screens, maybe not even lcd. It looks more like you’re watching a dvd from 2003 (i was testing a movie from 2016) on an old CRT television.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2020
column14: Just installed the two screens and they look great. The mounting hardware is very sturdy and seems to be high quality. The remotes felt a little cheap and I wish the player resumed from USB. But other than that they seem good. I will update after a few months of use.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2021
column14: This was a life saver for our vacation, but the power cuts out frequently for some reason. We have to in plug and plug back in. I plan to contact the company regarding this issue. I also have issues sometimes connecting the two together. I think the issue may be the plugs. This was our second set. The first set came opened and scratched up but amazon quickly replaced.

column6: great for playing a different movie for each kid
column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2020
column14: Easy to install, well made plays great

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2020
column14: Great bang for your buck. Kids love it - easy to operate. Have tried with movies on USB 64 GB flash drive (have to do a little extra to format in FAT32) and works well. Interface is a tiny bit slow.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2021
column14: Mounting the system was a breeze!!! Step by step instructions were very easy to follow!! Picture quality is amazing for what it is! The screen is great too! My kids love the fact they can watch 2 different movies instead of fighting over what movie to watch!
